question:
[Roger] walked his daughter [Carolyn] down the aisle on her wedding day. [Charles] dropped his son [Anthony] off at a friend's house for the night, as he was taking his wife [Mary] out to dinner. [Brad] was thrilled his brother, [Anthony], was able to make it to the party. [Julie] and her sister [Mary] decided to get some candy for [Julie]'s son [Dustin] and his sister [Carolyn]. [Carlos] rushed to the hospital to find out that his wife and already given birth to a boy and had named him [Roger].
Question: How is [Brad] related to [Carlos]?
